title: Removed Names
description: Santa keeps a draft naughty list and a final corrected list. Count how many names were removed: names that appear in the draft but not in the final list.

method_signatures.java: public static int removedNames(List<String> draft, List<String> fin)
method_signatures.python: def removed_names(draft: list[str], fin: list[str]) -> int
method_signatures.cpp: int removedNames(const std::vector<std::string>& draft, const std::vector<std::string>& fin)

input_format: First line: integer n. Next n lines: names in the draft. Next line: integer m. Next m lines: names in the final list.
output_format: An integer representing the number of removed names.

sample_tests.input:
4
Tim
Sarah
Milo
Tina
3
Sarah
Milo
Tina

tests.input:
5
A
B
C
D
E
3
A
D
E
